Lord's Edge.name: Lord's Edge
Lord's Edge.description: A champion holding Lord's Edge can't hold other items except temporary ones gained by this item. Lord's Edge cannot be given to a champion that already holds an item. On takedown, gain a BF Sword for the remainder of the round.

Hextech Gunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
Hextech Gunblade.description: Basic attacks and Special Abilities heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

Last Whisper.name: Last Whisper
Last Whisper.description: Attacks can't miss and deal True Damage equal to 5% of the target's maximum health

Sword of the Divine.name: Sword of the Divine
Sword of the Divine.description: Every second, has a 7% chance to gain 100% critical strike chance for the rest of combat.

Zeke's Herald.name: Zeke's Herald
Zeke's Herald.description: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row to the left and right gain 15% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat.

Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel
Guardian Angel.description: Upon death, cleanses negative effects and revives after 2 seconds with 500 health. This effect can trigger once per combat.

The Bloodthirster.name: The Bloodthirster
The Bloodthirster.description: Basic attacks heal for 40% of the damage dealt.

Youmuu's Ghostblade.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
Youmuu's Ghostblade.description: Wearer is also an Assassin TFT icon Assassin (including the Innate stealthed jump).

Rabadon's Deathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Rabadon's Deathcap.description: Increases Ability power icon ability power by 50%.

Guinsoo's Rageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
Guinsoo's Rageblade.description: Basic attacks grant 5% bonus attack speed for the rest of combat. Stacks with no upper limit.

Morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
Morellonomicon.description: Dealing damage with a Special Ability applies a burn on the enemies hit for 10 seconds, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration, reducing healing on the target.

Locket of the Iron Solari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
Locket of the Iron Solari.description: At the start of combat, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row to the left and right gain a 250 health shield for 6 seconds.

Ionic Spark.name: Ionic Spark
Ionic Spark.description: Whenever an enemy casts their Special Ability, they take 125 true damage.

Luden's Echo.name: Luden's Echo
Luden's Echo.description: When the wearer deals damage with their Special Ability, the first target hit and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 180 magic damage.

Yuumi.name: Yuumi
Yuumi.description: Wearer is also a Sorcerer TFT icon Sorcerer (including the Innate bonus of mana generation).

Thief's Gloves.name: Thief's Gloves
Thief's Gloves.description: A champion holding Thief's Gloves can't hold other items except temporary ones gained by this item. Thief's Gloves cannot be given to a champion that already holds an item. On round start, gain two temporary items. Their quality is based on your player level.

Repeating Crossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
Repeating Crossbow.description: When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow passes to a new ally and they gain an additional 20% Crit chance and 20% Attack Speed. This stacks with each pass of the item.

Backhand.name: Backhand
Backhand.description: The wearer starts combat with a spell shield. Stun the enemy that breaks the shield for a long time.

Iceborne Gauntlet.name: Iceborne Gauntlet
Iceborne Gauntlet.description: On dodge, create an expandable 30% attack speed slow zone.

Quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
Quicksilver.description: Prevents the next crowd control effect applied to the wearer. Refreshes every 5 seconds.

Hand of Justice.name: Hand of Justice
Hand of Justice.description: At the beginning of the planning phase, the wearer randomly gains either 40% increased damage or 40 life on hit until end of round.

Mittens.name: Mittens
Mittens.description: Extra 10% Crit chance and 10% Dodge chance. Wearer is also a Yordle

Titanic Hydra.name: Titanic Hydra
Titanic Hydra.description: Basic attacks deal 10% of your maximum health physical damage in a cone behind the target.

Phantom Dancer.name: Phantom Dancer
Phantom Dancer.description: Dodges critical strikes from basic attacks and Special Abilities.

Cursed Blade.name: Cursed Blade
Cursed Blade.description: Basic attacks have a 20% chance to shrink the target, removing 1 Star. A unit can be reduced to a 0-Star unit.

Statikk Shiv.name: Statikk Shiv
Statikk Shiv.description: Every third basic attack from the wearer deals 100 magic damage to the target and 2 additional targets.

Warmog's Armor.name: Warmog's Armor
Warmog's Armor.description: Regenerates 6% of missing health per second, up to a maximum of 400 health per tick.

Red Buff.name: Red Buff
Red Buff.description: Basic attacks apply a burn on the target 10 seconds, dealing 2% of target's maximum health true damage each second and applying Grievous Wounds for the duration, reducing healing on the target.

Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.description: At the start of combat, banishes for 5 seconds the unit that mirrors the wielder's placement on the other side of the board.

Redemption.name: Redemption
Redemption.description: When falling below 25% of maximum health, creates a zone that, after a 2.5 second delay, heals allies within for 1200 health. This effect can trigger once per combat.

Thornmail.name: Thornmail
Thornmail.description: When hit by a basic attack, reflects 100% of physical damage mitigated as magic damage to the attacker.

Sword Breaker.name: Sword Breaker
Sword Breaker.description: Basic attacks have a 25% chance to disarm the target for 4 seconds, preventing that enemy from basic attacking.

Frozen Heart.name: Frozen Heart
Frozen Heart.description: Reduces the attack speed of adjacent enemies by 25%.

Hush.name: Hush
Hush.description: Basic attacks have a 33% chance to mana-lock the target for 4 seconds, preventing the target from gaining mana.

Runaan's Hurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
Runaan's Hurricane.description: Basic attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% AD and applying on-hit effects.

Seraph's Embrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
Seraph's Embrace.description: After casting Special Ability, grants 20 mana.
